welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fort Mitchell, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, historic landmarks, and friendly community. We hope you'll enjoy your stay and experience all that our city has to offer. Happy exploring!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cincinnati/Northern Kentucky Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Cincinnati/Northern Kentucky Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cincinnati Municipal-Lunken Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Cincinnati Municipal-Lunken Field Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
